import React from 'react'; import Navbar from '../components/Navbar'; import HeroSlider from '../components/HeroSlider'; import FeatureCards from '../components/FeatureCards'; import ProductsSection from '../components/ProductsSection'; import Footer from '../components/Footer'; import './HomePage.css'; const HomePage = () => { // Datos de muestra para los productos destacados const featuredProducts = [ { id: 1, name: 'Lámpara Artesanal de Madera', category: 'Iluminación', image: '/oferta2.jpeg', price: 89.99, originalPrice: 119.99, discount: 25, rating: 4.5, reviewCount: 12, isNew: false }, { id: 2, name: 'Mesa de Centro Rústica', category: 'Muebles', image: '/product2.jpg', price: 249.99, originalPrice: 249.99, discount: 0, rating: 5, reviewCount: 8, isNew: false }, { id: 3, name: 'Estantería Modular', category: 'Almacenamiento', image: '/product3.jpg', price: 159.99, originalPrice: 199.99, discount: 20, rating: 4, reviewCount: 6, isNew: false }, { id: 4, name: 'Silla de Comedor', category: 'Muebles', image: '/product4.jpg', price: 79.99, originalPrice: 79.99, discount: 0, rating: 4.5, reviewCount: 10, isNew: false } ]; // Datos de muestra para los productos nuevos const newProducts = [ { id: 5, name: 'Lámpara de Pie Moderna', category: 'Iluminación', image: '/product5.jpg', price: 129.99, originalPrice: 149.99, discount: 15, rating: 4, reviewCount: 3, isNew: true }, { id: 6, name: 'Escritorio de Trabajo', category: 'Muebles', image: '/product6.jpg', price: 199.99, originalPrice: 229.99, discount: 10, rating: 5, reviewCount: 4, isNew: true }, { id: 7, name: 'Juego de Comedor', category: 'Muebles', image: '/product7.jpg', price: 599.99, originalPrice: 599.99, discount: 0, rating: 4.5, reviewCount: 2, isNew: true }, { id: 8, name: 'Espejo Decorativo', category: 'Decoración', image: '/product8.jpg', price: 69.99, originalPrice: 89.99, discount: 20, rating: 4, reviewCount: 5, isNew: true } ]; return (
); }; export default HomePage;
